# golemshinyi18n

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Example of using `{shiny.i18n}` inside a `{golem}` app: 

1. Create translation.json inside your inst/ folder/
1. Create a package object, inside data-raw, `usethis::use_data_raw( name = "i18n") `
1. Use this object inside the app. 

Note that you'll need to recompile the object (relaunch the script inside data-raw) every time you change the translation file.
